cause.description:
Welcome, pages! I've been a page since Nov. 2006, and have experienced a lot. If you are like me, join up and we can talk.
1. Fight for the right to reasonable tasks sand assignments.
2. Fight for the right to work the desk.
3. Fight for the to throw out messy kids... damn it!!!
cause.mission: provide a source of reliquishing any harsh feelings about how job and help each other create conclusions to problems that seem to never end.
cause.name: Library Pages of the World Unite
